name: Untitled Elastic Ranged Weapon Game With Ammunition Of Significant Weight The Game
name_original: Untitled Elastic Ranged Weapon Game With Ammunition Of Significant Weight The Game
description:
This game is submission to the Mix and Game Jam (2019).

The game was inspired by 'Heavy bullets'. 
Link: https://devolverdigital.itch.io/heavybullets

How to play:

WASD and arrows for movement.

Left mouse or left control to fire arrows.

Right mouse or left shift to  dodge.

R or spacebar to reload.

Your goal is to clear the dungeon.

Credits:
Programming: Elias Pereira (ONCGM) & Iago Lucchese

Art People: Julia Vant (JOOJ), Nahuel Alvarez (Nahuy)
& Álvaro (Álvaro)

Sound Guy: Francisco Gabriel (CiscG)

Font: Wellbutrin by Karen Clemens & Apostrophe.
